message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $11,000. This product is in high demand, and I'm confident in its value.
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I think that's a reasonable compromise considering its value.
